column1: A square package appeared in the doorway
column2: and she drew it toward her. Attached to it was a third block. This she untied as before
column3: and removed the paper from her gift. It was a small trunk. She lifted the cover
column4: and there were Dolly's missing garments! A blue dress
column10: and even a tiny comb and brush
column11: were found in that wonderful trunk. Of course
column12: Dolly had to come out from her nook in the pillows
column13: and be dressed. It took some time
column14: because Little Cousin must stop to admire every separate garment. At last
column16: the third present was pulled in
column17: and it was a chair for Dolly to sit in.The fourth package was big and rather heavier than the others. The Little Cousin wondered what it could be
column18: and she found out just as soon as she could get it open. It was a dining-table for Dolly
column21: and a set of pretty china dishes.
